content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'citydatacontainer_azureopendatastorage_blob_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [citydatacontainer_azureopendatastorage_blob_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/citydatacontainer', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE fromdatasetsholiday (
	[dataType] varchar(8000),
	[dataSubtype] varchar(8000),
	[dateTime] datetime2(7),
	[category] varchar(8000),
	[subcategory] varchar(8000),
	[status] varchar(8000),
	[address] varchar(8000),
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[source] varchar(8000),
	[extendedProperties] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Safety/Release/city=Seattle/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [citydatacontainer_azureopendatastorage_blob_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM fromdatasetsholiday
GO
